channel.title: addItem and ::pickup command
channel.description: Ok my problem is this the addItem works fine with stackable items but when it comes to spawning 28 manta rays un-noted it only gives one. how can i fix this so it loops through the item slots until full?

item.title: addItem and ::pickup command
item.dc:creator: @playaplay78 playaplay78
item.description:
@playaplay78 wrote:

Yea I’ve got that, was hoping that there was away to only do it once and it work right…

well thanks anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: addItem and ::pickup command
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

Yeah, but change the 28 to a 1.

item.title: addItem and ::pickup command
item.dc:creator: @Blain2007 Blain2007
item.description:
@Blain2007 wrote:

[quote=“MoparScaperDude, post:2, topic:235954”]You need to have the addItem code 28 times. You cant spawn like this:

addItem (manta, 28) //not sure if thats the code, im not too java friendly

You need to have that line added 28 times.[/quote]

addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)
addItem (manta, 28)

item.title: addItem and ::pickup command
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

You need to have the addItem code 28 times. You cant spawn like this:

addItem (manta, 28) //not sure if thats the code, im not too java friendly

You need to have that line added 28 times.
